meanings.definition: A state in which two things are able to exist or occur together without conflict.
meanings.sent1: The compatibilities between the colors of the painting made it visually appealing.
meanings.sent2: The software update ensured the compatibilities between different operating systems.
meanings.sent3: The cake and ice cream had such great compatibilities that they became best friends on the dessert table.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship had compatibilities like puzzle pieces fitting perfectly together.
meanings.sent5: The compatibilities of the puzzle pieces made the picture complete.

meanings.definition: The ability of two or more devices or systems to work together without conflict.
meanings.sent1: The compatibilities of the printer and computer allowed for seamless printing.
meanings.sent2: The new software update improved the compatibilities between the devices.
meanings.sent3: The robots' compatibilities in syncing dance moves amazed the audience.
meanings.sent4: The compatibilities of the gears in the clock made time tick smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The compatibilities of the keys and locks ensured security in the building.

meanings.definition: The quality of being suitable for a particular purpose.
meanings.sent1: The shoe's compatibilities with different terrains made it versatile for hiking.
meanings.sent2: The chef tested the compatibilities of various ingredients for the new recipe.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's cape had special compatibilities that made it indestructible.
meanings.sent4: The compatibilities of the tailor's skills and fabric choices created stunning outfits.
meanings.sent5: The compatibilities of the tools in the toolbox made every task easier.
